redux and third party component Material-UI.
07/2017 – 12/2017
Quoine
259 Tran Hung Dao street - 1 district
Ho Chi Minh city - Viet Nam
We are a leading findtech company that provides trading, exchange, and next
generation financial services powered by blockchain technology. We believe
cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology will shape the future of financial
services.
Using react for create chat app on web with telegram API.
Implement front-end function on trading web-apps. (Trading
web-apps is product of QUOINE https://trade.quoinex.com/)
04/2016 – 06/2017
Clearway Solutions
33 Ba Vi street - Tan Binh district
Ho Chi Minh City - Viet Nam
PROVIDE SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS AS A SERVICE FOR OUR CUSTOMERS TO
MINIMIZE CAPEX AND MAXIMIZE ROI.
Develop for company's product: Grande Tracking System GTS
(Management of furniture production process, From order
receipt to completion of installation and maintenance)
Development with J-Query, React JS, Knock-out Js and
Bootstrap for font-end. Spring frame work of Java for back-
end.
Contact:Tuan Le–info@clearway.vn

applications using React JS
Experience using framework design Bootstrap,
Antd, Material UI, etc...

CSS, CSS3 Animation
Knowledge in Front-end building and packaging
script, dependencies manager, task runners (npm,
yarn, webpack)
Experienced in Java back-end service use Spring
framework, Data JPA, Hibernate
Familiar with source control system Git
(Open mind to research new technical)
LANGUAGES
English
INTERESTS

Sometime for soccer
